title: Great sishi
text: Beautiful decor, big inside, friendly staff, delicious food. Fare price. Free parking right by the restaurant

title: Learning history
text: A model museum, a must see. Walking distance from acropolis. It was worth the visit. Very friendly staff

title: A little disappointed
text: It’s not like 30 years ago. There is a place for the taxis, for buses to drop off the tourists. Very crowded. The lines moved fast, bathrooms facility , do wear high heal. Sneakers will do you a favor. Wear a hat and sunscreen

title: Party time
text: A beautiful clean, calm beach. Restaurants, clubs, cafes right in front of the beach. Public bus stop is right in front of the entrance to paradise beach. Music all day and night. Pack with tourists. Loved it

title: Amazing beach
text: Crystal clear water, accessible by bus. No sand. It’s pebbles all over. Bars at the beach , you can rent chairs,umbrellas

title: Amazing Hotel
text: Great location , walking distance to the beach, to the marker, to restaurant and to the bus stop. This hotel is extremely clean, the room was very big, great bathroom, comfortable beds, excellent experience with the receptionists and the staff. Beautiful pool, super clean. Delicious breakfast with lots of options. Will return next year. I already recommended to friends.

title: Spring Break
text:
I had book this trip with family a few months prior and the company was sending me emails changing the times of the flights. I was about to cancel the trip but decided to call customer services to find out what was going on. It was explained because of the planes that were ground , the company had to use another company. To make a long story short and decided to go ahead but changed the dates. And it was free of charge. Flight was on time both ways. Will flight norwegian again
Already got tickets to Greece for September

title: Massage and relaxation
text:
Place is very clean. Very small , with 2 tanks hot and cold water. Receptionist in a hurry and the staff that works near the tanks is like a police officer. Massage was great. I hated that we had to give the mandatory tip of $20 . No use of a face mask. If you do , will be charged $50. And don’t forget to pay taxes at the entrance. Please read every little posting around it. It was what save us a lot of money. We had brought a mask and was ready to used. Good that I like to read every post
I will not go back

title: Great sushi/ great services
text:
We chose this restaurant because was across street from the spa we went
It is a small cozy place. Very busy Friday night. No alcohol but we got a bottle of wine across from the restaurant and it was no problem. Great food , great services
I will recommend, and will go back

title: Fun Night
text: A beautiful show. I love Cher , the music was amazing. I had a good time with my friends at this show. It was more than I expected.

title: WHAT AN AMAZING SHOW
text:
One of the best show we’ve seen. Great music, and the specials effects no words to describe.
My friend suggested this show and said it was beautiful. I m so glad I said yes. If you have to chose one show , this is the one. You will not regret it.

title: Quick Bite
text: Running to eat something light before catching a Broadway Show . Small place, friendly staff, delicious food, amazing tea, and dessert . Very cheap food. Returned again last week with friends.

title: What a great surprise
text: I did not expected this show to be great. Boy I was wrong. Turned out to be a great show, great music, great singers and a little funny, I went to the show with some friends, and we all loved it.

title: Beautiful
text: It’s a nice place to spend the day. Skiiin, shopping, eating, drinking coffee , drinking, take pictures and enjoy the day as you like

title: Killing time
text: Lots of stores, a big place, need to drive from one store to another a few times. The prices are a little higher comparing with other outlets.

title: Wonderful ski trip
text: A very busy ski resort, with lots of shops, restaurants, bars, coffee shops, ski school and rentals. Huge parking lot. Go early to find free parking. A great place to take pictures and just spend time with love one. We loved. Will be going back soon

title: Disappointed
text: I did not like the show. Very boring. My friend is his fan and decided to buy the tickets on last minute.
place: Michael Jackson ONE by Cirque du Soleil

title: What an amazing show
text:
It’s so hard to describe this show. AMAZING!!!!!!!!!!
The best show I’ve seen in my life. It’s a must see. Will go back with family and recommend to all my friends.

title: Expensive Hotel
text: Stayed there with a friend for 3 nights. It’s a big hotel, great Christmas decorations. The problem is: no coffee maker in the rooms, anything you move such as snacks or water , it’s changed to account and it’s not chair. It’s some kind of sensor that will activate as soon as you move any item. The room was of a good size, bathroom was big and clean, bed was good.

title: Good experience
text: Very small place, just to experience the cold. It’s expensive, we went to the cheapest deal without the drink. In and out in less than 15 minutes. Took a few pictures for our album and that was it.

title: Enjoying a beach day
text: December was not a hot day to be at Mission Beach but it was a beautiful sunny day. Me and my friend had our beach chairs and stayed for the sunset. beautiful peaceful and clean

title: Exploring tourist area
text: Not a pool for children. It’s a big tourist attraction. It’s beautiful area with lots of seals. Very exciting place to spend about 2 hours and take lots os pictures

title: Beautiful Place / it’s a must
text: It’s a big open are with restaurants , bars, shops with typical mexican food, candies, ice cream , and souvenirs. It’s good to spend about 3 to 4 hours exploring. We went there very early and was easy to find parking free for 2 hours , then we went back and move the car to another spot for another 2 hours.

title: Loved the food and the big Margaritas
text:
I was visiting the old Town with a friend and after walking for a few hours we heard some live music and decided to check the place. Very nice, food was great, 1 plate shared by 2 and still had food left over. We ordered margaritas, and they were big ones. Our waitress was very friendly.
I will sure go back. The price was very fair.

title: A Day at the Beach
text:
Very clean beach, Chrystal water. Warm
A paradise! No waves! Like a swimming pool
To me and my friend this is the best beach in Martinique. We loved it

title: Exploring Martinique
text:
I had read lots of reviews about this beach!! What a disappointment! Very crowded beach! The water very dirty! None of us wanted to go in!
But the tourists can eat there, and buy souvenirs to take home! We all seat to eat in one of the restaurants there and hated the food! We gave our fish and dirty shrimp to the cats!

title: Quick stop for coffe and sweets
text: Ww were just walking exploring the place and saw this beautiful bakery. Looked like a bar from the streets but we decide to go inside and to our surprise it was a bakery!!! We had coffe with some French sweets! Don’t ask me the names of the sweets because I don’t speak French and didn’t understand the nice lady! We point the sweets we wanted and how many. The price was good! It’s licated right across the street from the entrance at the beach.

title: Get away from the cold
text: Place is not a 5 star hotel but it’s very nice, clean, well maintained. The room is a small studio with a patio with a table and chairs to eat outside and enjoy some French wine. The pool is clean. The owner was very helpful and accommodating. Price is very fair. It’s located in a residential area, very safe. A 5 minutes walk to the best beach ever!!!! Blue water. Just by club med. Near a so called Deli and a great pizza place. If you need to rent a car. It’s a 5 minute walk. I will go back and will recommend this place to friends and family.

title: Great lunch
text:
Great lunch with my daughter who suggested this place. I had vegetable noodles and my daughter had chicken noodle! Delicious food and great cold green tea. Will be back again
The price is just right

title: Quick lunch with my daughter
text: It was my daughter first time there and we do live in Astoria. We ordered chicken souvlaki platter and fried fish with chips. Food was good!

title: Relaxing Sunday
text:
Very beautiful vineyard, well maintained, very cheap for the tasting! You can bring your own food!!! They have a food truck with fast food outside and live music!!!! We had a great time!!!!
Parking is free!!!!

title: Relaxing day
text: A very beautiful place that smell soooo goood. Beautiful Lavender plants. Do not take any lavender because you have the risk to be quick out of the place. Buy a bunch of fresh lavender for $10 at the small store. And please buy the best lavender cookie there for $4. They have parking! Go early because gets very crowded. We loved it

title: Late dinner and desert
text:
Nice place! My friends ordered about 6 different dishes! I had capuchino and a piece of plain cheese cake
It was good

title: Sunday Breakfast
text: We loved this place! Its a big place, service was great, great fresh food, very cheap! The coffee was great!!! We will go back !!

title: Birthday Brunch
text: The service was excellent, great coffee, delicious food. Beautiful place!!! We all loved and will go back soon.

title: Great breakfast
text:
Got out of my gym early and hungry, just across the street saw this diner, why not?
Great place, food was delicious and cheap!
Will return for breakfast with friends
Loved it

title: Great food/ giant plates
text:
Big place in Astoria, spanish food!
The grill chicken was delicious! The seasoning was perfect! I enjoyed my rice and beans ! Price is great
Try the soda : Colombian

title: GIRLS NIGHT
text:
My boss suggested this restaurant for our girls night! Its expensive, but the food was DELICIOUS! The coconut Mojito was great! And desert and coffe very good! Live music ! Nice !!
Oh I almost forgot about the service; great service

title: Relaxing afternoon with a friend
text:
We had to wait 15 minutes but got a great table by the windows! Waiter was very attentive and friendly! The coffe was wonderful and the sweets are delicious
Place its expensive

title: Great paozinho de Queijo
text:
Visited this Brazilian bakery with friends during vacation in Boca! It was packed and line was long. We almost gave up but the smell of coffe and other breads were so good we decided to wait! Good choice
The coffe was wonderful, the sweets and pao de queijo all fresh and delicious and very cheap
We kept returning there a few times during our stay! We love it

title: A quick bite
text:
Beautiful place, big, lots of options, the sushi is great! The price is just right
We went there Sunday for dinner
$12.99
All you can eat

title: Good Caribien food
text:
Went there by accident, we all loved it! The grill chicken was one of the best i had. Very fresh! We order the family meal for 4 people
Comes with whole chicken, white rice and black beans, ordered grilled chicken breast, very good
Sweet bananas and mango chicken salada
We all loved! A lot of food! Excellent price
Me and my family went there for 4 days during our vacation

title: Great experience to learn the celebration from different countries and cultures
text:
A beautiful place, big, with lots of Christmas memories and decorations from different countries and different times
Fair price, parking is free

title: FRESH DELICIOUS FOOD
text: All you can eat, and lots of desert! Its a buffet! We loved and will return! Will recommend for friends and family!!! Very cheap!!!

title: THE MIRACLE OF CHRISTMAS SHOW
text:
What a dream, wonderful, great music, magic!! I DONT HAVE WORDS TO DESCRIBE! Job well done
We loved it! Will go back next year ! And for different shows too

title: Quick lunch with co workers
text: My big boss invited us for lunch at this place in tbe Bronx. I was very surprised with the place, beautiful, well decorated, big, great service, excellent food, and cheap ! I loved their food! I m planning to retur with friends and family!!

title: Delicious Brazilian food
text:
A big place, beautiful decor, live band , nice bar, and lots of Brasilian food! Try the caipirinha, and pao de queijo! Delicia
Price is fair!
Loved it
Will return with families

title: Great Place to Spend a few hours with family
text:
I had a good time with my family. It was monday afternoon, not crowded! Took lots of pictures
Its not so big, like the ones in the US but its worth the visit.
The only bad thing: price is too high

title: Beach day
text:
I love Brighton Beach 14
Its clean, water is calm, excellent for families with small children
Small cafes, restaurants and street vendors
Easy access by train! Enjoy some shopping after the beach! Russian Chocolate and try some caviar

title: Food from Heaven
text: Cozy place, clean, great food, good price!!! Food is fresh and they have VEGETARIAN PLATES!!! We loved it and will go back to try something else

title: Heaven Food
text: Very beautiful place with wonderful decor! We took so many pictures! The food is delicious and fresh! Dont forget to order fresh lemonade with mint! Great services! Veg plates to. My daughter loved it

title: Yale University
text: Took my teen on Sunday to visit and explire Yale University It is a beautiful University, very big, and so many builldings. Reminded me of the Harry Potter School Buildings! My daughter loved it! The train station is a 5 minute walk.

title: Brunch with the girls
text:
Great service, very pleasant staff, place is clean and spacious. Great Brunch. A large variety of food. Price is fairs. We were a group of 10 women and did not feel squished.
We loved it.

title: Caribbean crystal water in Brasil
text: What a beautiful beach. Water was crystal clear. I went there twice , week day and weekend, it was very crowded on Sunday. I reccomend to visit over the week.

title: A PARADISE!!!!!!!!!!
text:
Beautiful clean and quite beach. It's like a blue swimming pool.
The first time I visited, I went through a trial. Very tired , but I loved it. The second time I took a water taxi from the Praia dos Anjos and paid $15 per person and took us 15 minutes.

title: Very famous beach, beautiful.
text: Beautiful clean beach. I took a bus from Cafo Frio to the Prainha. About $2 one way. The bus left us right by the hill. The scenery on the bus was beautiful

title: The stop before heading to the Praia do Forno -trial
text: Beautiful church, well maintained. Lots of Turists taking pictures, including me. Entrance is free. A good place to reflex and rest.

title: Small, Quite, crowded beach
text: A very small cozy beach. Clean water, no waves. Good for children. Free entrance. Lots of boats. Lotsssss of boats. We went sightsing Buzios beaches, and this one is one that we will not return.

title: Hello shoppinggggg
text: We loved Rua das Pedras. Lots of small shoppings with hand made souvenirs. Great prices. There we bought all our small gifts to take home.

title: Great board walk to sightseeing the beaches and Rua das Pedras
text: Very nice walk, small gift shops all around. Clean , lots of turists. It's a must see place. Great for pictures.
